text: Mary Grace Canfield (September 3, 1924 - February 15, 2014) was an American actress. She began her career in 1954. She often played the role of a romance- starved spinster or wallflower. Canfield was born in Rochester, New York. She was brought up in Pittsford, New York. Her older sister, Constance, was two years older. Canfield died from lung cancer on February 15, 2014, aged 89, in Santa Barbara, California. She was outlived by her husband, John Bischof, and two children from a previous marriage. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Rochester, New York Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in California
title: Mary Grace Canfield
